items.title: Pollution, Not Drought, Prompts Lawn-Watering Ban in Des Moines
items.description: Right before a sweltering weekend in Iowa, the water authority for the Des Moines metro area banned its 600,000 customers from watering their lawns.  Though that’s a water conservation practice familiar to residents of drought-stricken states, the Iowa ban isn’t about water scarcity.
